Text: Hacker is a card game (not a trading card game) made by Steve Jackson Games (SJG).

1:
--------------------
Text: Hacker (card game):  Published in 1992, the players impersonate hackers fighting for the control of computer networks.
Triplets:<Hacker
2:
--------------------
Text: Hacker (card game):  It is based primarily on interlocking access to different computer systems in the web.
Triplets:<Hacker
3:
--------------------
Text: Hacker (card game):  Players are not set directly towards each other, and several players can share access to a system.
Triplets:<Hacker

<Text: Hacker (card game):  It is superficially similar (modulo terminology) to the game "Illuminati".>
